entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • GradientStop with a Color Binding of RelativeSource throws a System.NullReferenceException #19253
    Backlog
  • Popup with an Entry or Editor at bottom goes off screen from top when keyboard comes up #27435
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [NET10.0] Fix parameter name for `ScrollViewerExtensions.UpdateScrollBarVisibility` #28255
    community ✨
  • [Android] Image is not loading in RadioButton - fix #28254
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton

Merged

  • Fix Modal Test using correct Page #28250
    area-testing, area-controls-modal, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR6

Updated

  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Android] Support for images inside HTML label #21679
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator improvements - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview, collectionview-cv2
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not enabled [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Applying global styles to shadows #20203
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Android Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride #20179
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Revert] [iOS] CollectionView with grouped data crashes on iOS when the groups change - fix #28246
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Trimming][PoC] Make it possible to trim controls and handlers #28115
    t/app-size
  • Inheriting Visual States #20467
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
    area-architecture
  • [NET10.0] Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28244
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
